title: Pulse
description: Andrea, Lexie and Sarah are ordinary teens until the day the world shut down.In this chilling Christian YA tale, the girls and their families must develop faith and grit to survive.But can they find the strength when society collapses and technology fails?PULSE takes readers into a heart-pounding future for America, while affirming the power of faith in the darkest of times.
author: L.R. Burkard
